channel.description: Recent content in Image Classification on Nikita Kiselev

item.title: Unraveling the Hessian: A Key to Smooth Convergence in Loss Function Landscapes
item.description: Exploring the convergence of the loss landscape in neural networks as the sample size increases, focusing on the Hessian matrix to understand the local geometry of the loss function
